actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-191.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on the Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Energy and Natural Resources.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, S. Rept. 95-517.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey the interest of the United States in certain lands in Adams County, Miss., notwithstanding a limitation in the Color-of Title Act (45 Stat. 1069, as amended; 43 U.S.C. 1068).

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey the interest of the United States in specified lands in Adams County, Mississippi, to certain citizens.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey the interest of the United States in certain lands in Adams County, Miss., notwithstanding a limitation in the Color-of Title Act (45 Stat. 1069, as amended; 43 U.S.C. 1068).
